channel.title: Software you use?
channel.description:
I thought this could be interesting. :] Just list what you have for each topic. :D
AntiVirus: Nod32
AntiSpyware: Spyware Doctor
Firewall: none, atm. ;|
Disk Defragmenter: PerfectDisk 8
Internet Browser: Firefox
Registry Cleaner/Other Optimizers/ect.. System Utilities/: Registry Mechanic, CCleaner
Audio Player: Winamp Pro
Instant Messenger: Pidgin
Torrent Client: Azureus
Share, ftw.

item.title: Software you use?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“MybBob, post:21, topic:128043”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=178683.msg1635299#msg1635299 date=1185716820]

Instant Messenger:
Kopete

Kopete annoys me… I guess I’m too used to MSN. Hybrid clients are shitty 90% of the time, imo

MSN annoys the hell out of me, I never really liked GAIM very much, but Kopete rules.

And yes konqueror is good, why else would I use it?
[/quote]

To prove rednecks can be with it ? :)[/quote]
Lol’d.

Read full topic

Just post your programs already.
Mines are already listed
